quote: I always say I'm the luckiest sick person alive.
why_clipworthy: This statement captures Athena's resilience and positive outlook despite her chronic illness.
suggested_hook: How a top REALTOR turns adversity into strength.

quote: Culture and community are really the two of the biggest pillars of my business.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of building a supportive network in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why community is key to real estate success.
